item.title: RaBitQ has been received by SIGMOD' 24
item.description: Congratulations to Jianyang Gao for publishing the paper “RaBitQ: Quantizing High-Dimensional Vectors with a Theoretical Error Bound for Approximate Nearest Neighbor Search” at SIGMOD 2024!

item.title: ADSampling has been received by SIGMOD' 23
item.description: Congratulations to Jianyang Gao for publishing the paper “RaBitQ: Quantizing High-Dimensional Vectors with a Theoretical Error Bound for Approximate Nearest Neighbor Search” at SIGMOD 2023!
